version_description:
v2.70

This update is contain some minor changes. A new help system and tip system which gives you more information regarding the flow of the app.

- New App Help system found in the Information section
- New Tip system allowing you to open the section the tip is about easily.
- Update Splash screen and icons
- Minor Bug Fixes
- UI Font Updates

v2.70

This update is contain some minor changes. A new help system and tip system which gives you more information regarding the flow of the app.

- New App Help system found in the Information section
- New Tip system allowing you to open the section the tip is about easily.
- Update Splash screen and icons
- Minor Bug Fixes
- UI Font Updates

v2.70

This update is contain some minor changes. A new help system and tip system which gives you more information regarding the flow of the app.

- New App Help system found in the Information section
- New Tip system allowing you to open the section the tip is about easily.
- Update Splash screen and icons
- Minor Bug Fixes
- UI Font Updates

v2.71

- iOS11 Fixes for sharing.
- Tips now appear once every 2 weeks (was weekly before). They can also be turned off in settings.
- iOS9 now the minimum required for our app.
- Minor Bug Fixes

v2.80

- High Quality Resized images for iPhone X
- iPhone X Interface Adjustments
- Library View now has independent volume
- UI interface Tweaks
- Performance Enhancements
- Minor bug fixes

v2.90

v3.00

As always thank you for your support. In this update we have added a new Premium Sound Store. The Premium Subscription Store
will allow me to continually add more and more sounds, so I can build up a library of hundreds of sounds. Some of
the sound highlights of the Premium Store are the Binaural and Isochronic sounds that can improve mood and energy level.

Please help support our app with a subscription to our Premium Store for as little as $1.67/month with a yearly commitment.

- Added Premium Store Subscription
- Optional Main UI Update
- Updated Help Guide & Tip System
- App Optimizations
- Bug Fixes
